channel.title: Posts on Panagiotis Simakis
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Panagiotis Simakis

item.title: OSS: Estimate and monitor the number of active users using Github Actions
item.description: Track and monitor the total number of users using Github Actions.

item.title: Add prefect flow visualizations into a Sphinx project
item.description: This article demonstrates an easy way to add your prefect flow visualizations into your sphinx documentation using the `sphinxcontrib-prefectviz` plugin.

item.title: Exclude files from your dropbox easily using dropboxignore
item.description: it's all about the missing .dropboxignore file. This post introduces the dropboxignore, a tool that allow you to ignore files or folder from your dropbox using patterns.

item.title: Store images efficiently in scrapy using folder structure
item.description: How to employ folder structure as an efficient and easy way to store large number of images using scrapy pipelines

item.title: Semi-Supervised Fraud Detection
item.description: A jupyter notebook about semi-supervised fraud detection.

item.title: Book Depository Dataset EDA
item.description: This notebook introduces the Book Depository Dataset and extracts some useful insights.
